column4: how come i cant extract rar files on my windows drive from ubuntu.? is that impossible?
if you can mount the partition theres no reason you shouldnt be able to access any non encrypted fiels
i cant mount it. so that's weird. I got all these rar archives all together containg a dvd movie. you know like .r00, .r01 and so on
it says something about the archive aint supported. but it's normal rar files
you need to install the rar codec, "sudo apt-get install rar"
i can see the files, i can play avi and mp3 files from there, but i cant extract my dvd movie
you need to install the rar codec, "sudo apt-get install rar"
so open a terminal, paste the line i posted (without quotes) into a terminal and your away
when i try to install it says E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/) is another process using it?
close the synaptic  or update app you have open
and you can install a package :-)
hehe.. well i just spend lots of money on this pc for gaming
do you know how i dowload directly from limewire to my windows partition?
you should use frostwire instead of limewire
and the destination directory will be in the settings
